price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ߬ ߞߎߘߎ߲߫ ߡߊ߫ ߕߊ߬ߡߌ߲߫ ߡߐ߱ ߡߊ߬ ߘߎߢߊߘߐߕߍ߮ ߘߐ߫ ߓߵߊ߬ ߕߎ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߝߋ߲߫ ߞߏߝߐߕߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߘߐ߫؟
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hal atā ʿalā al-insāni ḥīnun mina al-dahri lam yakun shayan madhkūran
